SEARCH
Package model

Class Appointment

Object
Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPublisher
public class Appointment extends Object implements IPublisher
The Appointment class represents an appointment, which associates a Patient with a Doctor. It is a Publisher and notifies Subscribers when the status of the appointment changes.
